uno.cards
Class Action_Card

java.lang.Object
  uno.cards.UNO_Card
      uno.cards.Action_Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<UNO_Card>
public class Action_Card
extends UNO_Card

The Action_Card class provides an UNO action card. The color of the card may be one of the following:

  • BLUE,
  • RED,
  • YELLOW,
  • GREEN, or
  • BLACK
. Each Action_Card has one of the following actions:
  • DRAW_2,
  • REVERSE,
  • SKIP,
  • WILD, or
  • WILD_DRAW_4.
WILD and WILD_DRAW_4 cards must be BLACK. Only WILD and WILD_DRAW_4 cards may be BLACK.

Method Detail

compareTo

public int compareTo(UNO_Card other)
Compares two action cards. Two action cards are equal if their actions are equal. Otherwise, they are unequal.

Specified by:
compareTo in interface Comparable<UNO_Card>
Overrides:
compareTo in class UNO_Card
Parameters:
The - action card to compare.
Returns:
0 id the two cards are of the same action type. Otherswise, 1 is returned.
